name: Steamer S'mores
description: Thank you, Darcie Baxter, for this recipe!
preparation: In Multipurpose Pot, melt butter. Whisk in brown sugar, milk, and vanilla.
Add graham cracker crumbs to butter mixture. Stir until mixed.
In Round Steamer, layer graham crackers. Cover with graham cracker batter. Add a layer of marshmallows. Sprinkle with chocolate chips.
Repeat to complete three layers in the steamer.
In preheated 350° F oven, bake 16–20 min.
Remove from oven and allow to cool completely.
Refrigerate 1 hr, remove from steamer and serve!
